entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 16 February 2023
